mapper.sql: mmediadtlid, mmediaid, xpos, ypos, fileidx, filepath, filename, size, createtime
mapper.select: select v.* from video v, mmedia mm where v.videoid = mm.objid and mm.objtype = '1' and mm.mmediaid = '${mmediaid}'
select i.* from image i, mmedia mm where i.imageid = mm.objid and mm.objtype = '2' and mm.mmediaid = '${mmediaid}'
